SEARCH

Class Member

java.lang.Object
Member
public class Member extends Object
Represents a member of the legislative assembly. Contains details about the member's name, constituency, party, and contact info.

  • Constructor Summary

      Records the member's vote on a bill.

      vote - Vote ("yes" or "no").
